activities.name: Copy data from REST to Database

scripts.text:
DECLARE @LastArchiveDate DATETIME = '2018-01-01'
SELECT @LastArchiveDate = [LastArchiveOrderDate] FROM [dbo].[Transactions_ArchiveConfig] WHERE [TableName] = 'Transactions_SalesOrder'
SELECT DATEADD(DAY,1,@LastArchiveDate) AS LastArchiveDate

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Transactions_Temp_SalesOrder

CREATE TABLE Transactions_Temp_SalesOrder
(
  SaleOrderId INT NOT NULL,
  CustomerId INT NOT NULL,
  SalesPersonId INT NOT NULL,
  OrderDate DATE NOT NULL,
  TaxAmt MONEY NOT NULL,
  TotalDue MONEY NOT NULL
)

activities.name: CREATE Destination table if not exists

scripts.text:
if not exists (select * from sysobjects where name='dimProduct'  and xtype='U')
   CREATE TABLE [dbo].[dimProduct](
[PID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
[ProductID] [int] NOT NULL,
[ProductName] [nvarchar](40) NULL,
[CategoryID] [int] NULL,
[CategoryName] [nvarchar](15) NULL,
[start] [datetime] NULL,
[end] [datetime] NULL
)
--go
